topic.title: Parsing text
topic.body:
How to parse big text file into DB file with compression (maybe mongoDb)?

I have a text file that included that text:

A: d4kjl23q3h3
B: zl3uoaseur
C: dioajo242343
|||
A: dsadasjkdhiu2
B: asdiouadiousjdoia
C: djaskldkjadjksdk
|||
A: doaisadilosalosdjuadju
B: dajsfdkugweiu
C: asjdiasdjliasdoldilool
|||

1574449091_1MFJwynRwEkS2vHr8BH21DjDBEXcb.body:
Try Yggdrasil network http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PffaPsQp81gec3GbLDTzH3cY57WuRfC36/builds.html. 
It's like a local network, but can be extended over the world.
If you just want to connect iranian people, the yggdrasil is must have thing

> [igork](#comment_1_1KVSDgKaZjjDE5cNq9AEbrFr9oBTm3DHkR): Try Yggdrasil network http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PffaPsQp81gec3GbLDTzH3cY57WuRfC36/builds.html.It's like a local network, but can be extended over the world.If you just want to connect iranian people, the yggdrasil is must have thing

You can setup chat programs as IRC and forward it over yggdrasil
